item.title: Lucky Number
item.description: We are given the server source code in Python: #!/usr/bin/env python #hacklu23 Baby Crypyo Challenge import math import random from Crypto.Cipher import AES from Crypto.Random import get_random_bytes import base64 import os def add(e): return e+(length-len(e)%length)*chr(length-len(e)%length) def remove(e): return e[0:-ord(e[-1:])] length=16 def main(): flag= os.environ["FLAG"] print("Starting Challenge") key=get_random_bytes(32) message=add(flag) iv=get_random_bytes(length) cipher=AES.new(key,AES.MODE_CBC,iv) cipher_bytes=base64.b64encode(iv+cipher.encrypt(message.encode("utf8"))) print(cipher_bytes.decode()) for l in range(0,5): A=[] print("You know the moment when you have this special number that gives you luck?
